children.content: .container { width: 100vw; height: 100vh;font-family: sans-serif;display:flex;justify-content: center; align-items: center ;} .btn {border: 0px;border-radius: 4px;margin: 10px;height: 30px;width: 60px;}.btn:hover {cursor: pointer;}.btn-primary {color: white;background: blue; } input { border: none; margin-top: 10px; border-bottom: 1px solid black }

attributes.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center;
